definition: to depend on/to comply with or listen to sb/according to/in the light of
according to/in accordance with/to shine/to illuminate/to reflect/to look at (one's reflection)/to take (a photo)/photo/as requested/as before

sentences.english: The proceeds as generated from any rule-breaking trading shall be dealt with pursuant to the relevant regulations.
sentences.chinese: 在違規交易中所獲利益，依照有關規定處理。

sentences.english: The organization templates are presented in increasing order of formality.
sentences.chinese: 我們依照形式化遞增的順序介紹組織模板。

sentences.english: According to experts in this area, this language instinct is innate-something each of us is born with.
sentences.chinese: 依照這方面的專家說，語言是我們出生就會的本能。

sentences.english: The mind should be directed in the right channel, according to well-formed plans.
sentences.chinese: 要依照周全的計劃，指導心思順着正當的方向。

sentences.english: By Egyptian record, Keftiu was destroyed by the seas in an apocalypse.
sentences.chinese: 依照埃及人記載，克弗悌烏在一次天啓中被海洋毀滅。

sentences.english: The sons of Gerson also were numbered by the kindreds and houses of their fathers.
sentences.chinese: 革爾雄的子孫，依照宗族和家系登了記。

sentences.english: Article 31 Military transport on railways shall be handled in accordance with relevant provisions laid down by the State.
sentences.chinese: 第三十一條鐵路軍事運輸依照國家有關規定辦理。

sentences.english: According to the university calendar your examinations will be in June.
sentences.chinese: 依照大學的行事曆，你們的考試將在六月舉行。

sentences.english: The exhibits were arranged according to schools.
sentences.chinese: 展品是依照流派陳列的。

sentences.english: They are either manifest or subtle, according to the nature of the gunas.
sentences.chinese: 它們依照三德的本性，或明顯，或細微。

sentences.english: You must seperate the cargoes according to their properties.
sentences.chinese: 你船裝運白勺這批危險貨物必須依照性質進行隔離。

sentences.english: The thumbnail will be scaled to a rectangle as large as possible inside a given rectangle, preserving the aspect ratio.
sentences.chinese: 縮圖會依照原有的比例，儘可能縮放到指定的矩形中。

sentences.english: You double-bag like the lady says, understand?
sentences.chinese: 依照那位女士說的用雙袋，明白了嗎？

sentences.english: The Dangerous Goods Store to be provided in accordance with plans approved by the Director of Fire Services.
sentences.chinese: 應依照消防處處長所批准之圖則設置危險品倉。

sentences.english: Article 81 Activities for flood control shall be conducted in accordance with the provisions in the Flood Control Law.
sentences.chinese: 第八十一條從事防洪活動，依照防洪法的規定執行。

sentences.english: Clause 21. The design unit shall pay taxes in accordance with the stipulations of Chinese tax law.
sentences.chinese: 第二十一條設計單位應依照我國稅法規定，交納稅費。

definition: according to/in accordance with/in the light of/on the basis of
to consult a reference/to refer to (another document)
provision/to fix/to set/to formulate/to stipulate/to provide/regulation/rule/CL:個|个[ge4]
to follow/to abide by/to comply with/compliance
to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
(to do sth) separately/as a separate action
to comply with/to follow (directives)/to defer (to the judgment of superiors)
in keeping with/in accordance with/tallying with/in line with/to agree with/to accord with/to conform to/to correspond with/to manage/to handle
